waitForCallbackQuery(data, callback)

If you send some inline keyboard after that you can call this method, pass to it string callback data or array of string or your InlineKeyboardMarkup and then when user press button CallbackQuery will be passed to callback
Parameters:
Name Type Description
data string | Array.<string> | InlineKeyboardMarkup
callback waitForCallbackQueryCallback
